data.title: Market to Mid Arch Flashpoint
data.description: Use this simple, but effective flash to contest Mid from Market. This blind will not flash your teammates if they were to peek from Cat.

data.title: Aggressive A Main Flash From Tree
data.description: Use this flash to successfully set up your teammates peeking down A Main, or to disrupt the Attackers' push.

data.title: Tree to A Main Reclear Fault Line + Aftershock
data.description: Combo your utility like so, to set up your teammates in reclearing A Main.

data.title: Defense Mid Arch Flash
data.description: If you hear the attackers pushing mid or running up cat, a simple flash through this wall will blind them all.

data.title: Close Right A Popflash
data.description: If you're in a pinch and playing close A with a shotgun or smg, this flash will catch attackers off guard and maybe score you some kills.

data.title: Garden Defense Flash from Window
data.description: Good for safetly securing a frag if you're holding A short. Flash pops low and in a pretty unexpected area.
